remarks: The left inverse of a group element.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
grpinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinv.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpinv.u $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grplinv $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( N ` X ) .+ X ) = .0. ) $.
